metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6915 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A Null pointer dereference problem was found in ida_free in lib/idr.c inthe Linux Kernel. This issue may allow an attacker using this library tocause a denial of service problem due to a missing check at a functionreturn.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
